snippet.title: DONG DONG NEVER DIE: JUDGMENT DAY | Announcement and release trailer
snippet.description:
Download now (it's free!): https://dismasthepenitent.itch.io/dong-dong-never-die-judgment-day
Dong Dong Discord: https://discord.gg/Qg8K8MKAfP

After approximately 20 months of development, Judgment Day, the massive rework/unofficial update to Dong Dong Never Die, is finally here! 23 of the 24 playable characters have been overhauled, with every character receiving new moves, and many characters receiving character-defining tools that completely reshape how they play. Additionally, a new fully playable character, Inugami Korone, has been added to the roster.

Aside from the character-specific changes, a LOT of universal and system changes have been made. The goal was to create a fun and novel fighting game experience, that still looks and feels like Dong Dong.
